} } } Length:: 0:31 MinsCheck all features of your camera carefully!! Both models I received suffered from the same problem. I've given up now and will choose another brand.Blue/purple vertical lines appear in the recorded HD video. They are most prominent in lower light scenarios with solid color backgrounds (such as indoors, against a wall). The lines are not present in the pictures, or in VGA video. I returned the first camera, hoping it was fluke, but the second version suffered from the same problem, just in a slightly different location. This is probably poor quality control, and I'm betting most of the other users have the same problem, they just haven't noticed it yet. I've tried to upload a video, but Amazon's video compression will probably remove the lines. The most prominent line appears in the very center of the frame. Again, this is visible on ALL HD videos, it's just harder to make out when the background is busy.As to the picture quality, it's what you'd expect from a camera this small. Photos are adequate in daylight, but suffer in low light scenarios (not much better looking than my phone).Video quality looks overly smoothed, probably from heavy handed noise filtering.I cannot attest to the ruggedness or waterproofing of the camera, since it was defective right out of the box.TL;DR - HD video recording is defective. Photos are ok with enough light. Would not buy.

Reviews.Title: water proof great
Reviews.Author: Jamie M. Brewin "Jamie"
Reviews.Content: we went on vacation at a water park and i had it on the whole time. it worked beautifully. i got lots of compliments and odd looks too. the pics came out great. its made to handle bumping too and it held up pretty good with that as well.i recommend this camera for anyone who wants to alot of pics on the water. it also takes pretty nice pics. night time pics not so much since the flash doesnt go that far. overall good camera for what my needs were.

Reviews.Title: Read mixed reviews and took a chance, but it disappointed
Reviews.Author: pam bomersbach
Reviews.Content: I liked the features on this camera, so I took a chance on it, even though many reviews stated that it stopped working after the first time out.  I took my new camera to Cancun, and was loving it in the beginning.  There are a lot of fun features, and it seems user friendly.  I took it in the pool one day, and followed the instructions for after water use.  The camera failed to work for the remainder of the trip (only got 3 out of 8 days on it), and although the camera is working now, it is slow, and the left side of the viewer is not the same.  I have been meaning to contact Panasonic about it, but have been extremely busy since coming back from Paradise.  I considered the Panasonic Ts20, and maybe I should have chosen that one.  I may have just gotten a faulty camera, and would consider owning another Panasonic, but was disappointed with the underwater features.

Reviews.Title: Great product for the price. Mid range waterproof , weatherproof point and shoot camera
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: Bought this camera for a trip to the south pacific. Satisfied with the features and functionality. Good product for the price. My only gripe is that there is no lens cover

Reviews.Title: Very good underwater camera
Reviews.Author: Nick
Reviews.Content: I used this camera in the on vacation and took a lot of pictures underwater and they all came out very good, I would reccomend this to anyone who is going to need some underwater pictures.

Reviews.Title: Heavy Duty Camera that's Pocket Size.
Reviews.Author: JCinTN "JCinTN"
Reviews.Content: Heavy duty but able to take good pictures. I am somewhat clumsy and have dropped severalgood cameras which couldn't be repair. I am looking forward to a long life with this Lumix.

Reviews.Title: Quality not as good as expected
Reviews.Author: Carina Gonzales
Reviews.Content: The underwater shots were not as good as my daughters Fuji camera. Hers were in color and focus, mine looked gray.

Reviews.Title: Gift
Reviews.Author: SLChavez
Reviews.Content: So far camera looks good however, I like my Nikon Cool pix better. This was purchased as a present and they like it.

Reviews.Title: Better than expected.
Reviews.Author: JL
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera for my wife to take pictures while snorkeling. Although the pictures aren't super high quality, the camera does the job. Took some great pictures of Manta Rays and Tropical Fish while on vacation and was super glad to have an underwater camera with us. You get what you paid for and after doing some research I found this camera was the best "bang for the buck." This camera did not disappoint and I found that the pictures were better than I expected albeit not "high" quality but still great.

Reviews.Title: A small format, ruggetized camera.
Reviews.Author: J. Billhofer
Reviews.Content: The camera arrived on time and was well packaged. We shot over 200 images so far and have no real complaints. If the camera really works when submerged will the future show.

Reviews.Title: Good camera
Reviews.Author: Anita Rothgery
Reviews.Content: I am a home inspector and have trouble keeping the dirt out of a camera that goes under a home.  This camera is great for that.  The flash is not nearly as good as the flash on the camera we were using.  If they would improve the flash it would be perfect.

Reviews.Title: Good Camera
Reviews.Author: chasstone
Reviews.Content: Despite some negative reviews, this camera arrived very quickly, the package contained everything it stated, it all worked and worked well. My photos of the grandchildren in the pool and the sea were great; and it's a great price. The camera is plastic so I'm not yet sure just how durable it is ..... get the 16 or 32 gig card with it ... an essential, and the Nordic floating strap ... it keeps the camera afloat and is not too obtrusive.

Reviews.Title: Panasonic Lumix DMC-TS25
Reviews.Author: Silvio Henrique Araujo Couto
Reviews.Content: Bought because is waterproof. I had no problems in wet enviroments.Works fine, but with limitations. The pictures are acceptable.It's okay for the price.

Reviews.Title: Poor image quality.
Reviews.Author: Shuhai Fan
Reviews.Content: This camera is well build and cool. Focus fast. Video quality is ok. But Image is grainy even in bright daytime. Worse than my several cheap phones. When taking photos at night using flash light, 8 out of 10 are severely over exposure. Return it after one day testing. Feel pity about this camera. Although I got it at about 90 bucks when Amazon promoted it, I still don't like to keep it.

Reviews.Title: Not that great
Reviews.Author: John L. Wathen
Reviews.Content: Not too good with zoom. Fuzzy at digital zoom. Weak video.Does good for pocket camera used for collecting evidence in rainy weather.

Reviews.Title: great watterprof camera
Reviews.Author: Javier Carballo, Venezuela "Javier Carballo"
Reviews.Content: this camera change my days of beach and pool making amazing photos in all environments, digital zoom does its job, very happy with this purchase.

Reviews.Title: Worked underwater well!
Reviews.Author: Miles Copeland
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my daughter for our trip to Hawaii. Initially had been looking at waterproof cases, but well made ones cost almost as much as a camera. After looking at many reviews, I choose this camera and I have to report that it did very well.  Took great shots and video of the fish snorkeling as well as good pictures on land.  Two thumbs up!

Reviews.Title: Great Camera
Reviews.Author: Sajmon
Reviews.Content: battery life can be a little short, but worked well on our vacation to Hawaii.  No leaks despite a 4 and 7 year old as primary users. Good pictures both above and below water, but obviously not a SLR

Reviews.Title: Works great!
Reviews.Author: Darryl
Reviews.Content: -  Turns on fast!-  Takes video with sound-  Can setup for LED to be on constantly when taking video-  Time lapse feature works well, but may have to read the manualAnd yes, it takes nice pictures under water!  I don't have a $500 waterproof camera to compare it to, but I am happy with the purchase of this budget waterproof camera!

Reviews.Title: Easy to usd
Reviews.Author: R. ASTRID
Reviews.Content: Love it, very easy to use, photo and video both with accessible bottom, very nice pictures for the price.Less clear with zoom especially for the video, I will try not to zoom for videos.Has a Panoramic picture setting that I like too

Reviews.Title: I love it!!!!
Reviews.Author: Aixa Ripoll
Reviews.Content: I have one and I bought another one for my daugther.The photos are excellent escecially the beach. I love it!!!

Reviews.Title: Nice Design, Waterproof, But So-So Picture Quality
Reviews.Author: steve kloiber
Reviews.Content: This is a nicely designed compact waterproof camera, but having already owned a Panasonic DMC FZ18, I had higher expectations for the picture quality. Shooting in intelligent auto mode my 6 year old 8MP FZ18 kicks butt over the brand new 16MP TS25. Of course, the optics are different. For the most part, I was able to post process the images to get a (somewhat) acceptable outcome.I did use it underwater without problem.

Reviews.Title: Survived many Snorkles and abuse in the sand
Reviews.Author: A. Nakashian "all_day_breakfast"
Reviews.Content: I took this with me to Vieques for a 7 day vacation.  The waterproofing held!  I simply followed the instructions, and made sure there was never anything in the water seal before taking it into the sea.  It worked well down to about 10ft, with no moisture or fogging up of the lens.The picture quality was okay, but nothing to rave about.  Many of my underwater photos and videos were blurry and hard to make out.  The videos were especially dissapointing.

Reviews.Title: quick decision paid off
Reviews.Author: KLMN
Reviews.Content: we ordered this within 2 weeks of a beach and cruise vacation, wanted to try out a water camera, it was wonderful to have.  pictures came out great

Reviews.Title: Nice pictures and video under the water.
Reviews.Author: Gustavo R.
Reviews.Content: I recommend it. Nice pictures and video under the water. Good delivery time and all things arrived, camera, battery, user-guide and cd

Reviews.Title: serves it's purpose
Reviews.Author: mauimike "jaime"
Reviews.Content: this is a fine little camera for what it was designed for... shallow water snorkeling. bought this camera on cyber monday sale for about $110 making it well worth the money. best underwater pictures are at 6 -10 feet distance.

Reviews.Title: Cool waterproof camera with a tiny splashing price
Reviews.Author: Alam A.
Reviews.Content: Tested it, try it on land and water........goooood. The picture are good (not that super quality) but it meet my expectation.The battery lasted for 4 days, with the last day of full usage in the pool with my kids. No GPS or WIFI connection, but fit the price of less then $100.

Reviews.Title: Gift for our daughter!
Reviews.Author: R.Durand
Reviews.Content: Our daughter had this camera on her wish list for Christmas.  As far as I know, she is satisfied with the quality of this product.

Reviews.Title: Great for the $
Reviews.Author: sara kleckner
Reviews.Content: Amazing for the price I paid. Great clear pics in a small compact size. Easy to use. B. T w

Reviews.Title: Lens gets DIRTY
Reviews.Author: AB "AB"
Reviews.Content: Ok so YOU MUST GET a dust cover or case for this camera.  Unlike most camera that have that cover over the lens.  this doesn't so be prepared to clean it often and put it in a case.  It was easy for me to download pics to my computer with the memory card.  The cub scouts love using this camera and large screen for viewing their pictures.  I have not tested under water yet.

Reviews.Title: Good cheap waterproof camera
Reviews.Author: Austin Andersen
Reviews.Content: Took this to tahiti for honeymoon. Worked the whole time without issue of any leakage for lens fogging up. Didn't take it scuba diving but worked perfectly snorkeling. The one gripe is quality, but for $100 camera you get what you pay for. I did end up getting go pro 3+ silver after honeymoon and I would say save your money and get that instead, but wife likes ability to see photos which you can't do with gopro unless you buy attachment.One big negative was battery indicator. It said 2/3 for a very long time then within 5 minutes it was dead. This was with stock battery so that was disappointment as battery gave out before day was over and missed some opportunities.

Reviews.Title: Not great
Reviews.Author: Linda
Reviews.Content: I bought this to replace my old underwater Lumix which I had had for a long time.  Disappointed as if is not as good, shutter speed really slow.  Have bought a Canon which is much better

Reviews.Title: great pix
Reviews.Author: Roxanne German
Reviews.Content: terrific camera for travel and beach/pool shots.  withstands water, dropping, packing tight and takes great shots. i just love the color.  don't know why the blue costs more than the other colors, tho.

Reviews.Title: Great camera for the price!
Reviews.Author: Kim Morton
Reviews.Content: We bought this camera to use while snorkeling in Hawaii. It arrived with simple instructions and ready to use. We got some excellent underwater shots with it. It was easy to use, and produced close ups that are frame worthy. Very happy with the camera.

Reviews.Title: Nice camera
Reviews.Author: Johanna Mae Ondap
Reviews.Content: I loved this camera it take good pictures and also it is warerproof and dustproof. Great for outdoors! Xoom is okay. Price is great because its affordable.

Reviews.Title: good upgrade
Reviews.Author: Dennis Mulvaney "nondestruct"
Reviews.Content: Had to replace my Tough UW camera and this one is an improvement with better tele, features, ease of closing and speed.

Reviews.Title: amazing
Reviews.Author: kevin
Reviews.Content: used on two vacations not and every day use at sporting events, great camera awesome pics out of water for every day use and pictures under water come out so nice and clear  love the panoramic feature and the video on this took videos of my dive in St. Thomas and then again in the Jungles of Dominican Republic. Great !

Reviews.Title: Amazing little camera!
Reviews.Author: ioana
Reviews.Content: I've done my research, and definitely the best little waterproof camera for the money! It takes great photos, the construction is high quality, it's reliable, it small and looks very nice!

Reviews.Title: Decent setup for the price point!
Reviews.Author: maclaren4l
Reviews.Content: This camera, as long as you follow the care instructions, works really well under water.  It's light and compact so you tuck it in your beach shorts pockets.  The image quality is par with other similar size compacts.  The optics and the sensor size are the limiting factors.  It takes pretty decent panoramic captures. Overall I would recommend this buying new.

Reviews.Title: Awsome camera
Reviews.Author: Kyle J. Von Bose "Kyle von Bose"
Reviews.Content: My last Panasonic camera was great but started to get spots in the view screen after i got it wet on a rafting trip. This camera shouldn't have the same problems. most people use these simply for "point and shoot" photos, but if you take the time to learn how to use all the functions and perhaps get a book on digital photography, you can really get some amazing shots out of these little cameras.

Reviews.Title: Nearly perfect pictures
Reviews.Author: Julie L.
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera for a trip to the British Virgin Islands, where we would be in and out of water constantly.  I took nearly 650 pictures, most out of water.  This camera took excellent pics.  There are a large variety of settings available, which was great.  I especially loved the sunset setting, and took some amazing pics.  The underwater pics were good.  We only snorkel, so the depth of this camera suited us fine.  I was able to take clear and colorful pictures of the sealife.  Out of the 650 pics I took, only a handful were slightly foggy, but that appeared to be more sun glare on the water.  I also took video, in and out of water, which worked perfectly.  As to being shockproof, I did drop it a couple times without issue (we were on a boat and it fell off the counter when sailing).  I am very satisfied with this purchase, and highly recommend it to anyone wanting a durable and waterproof camera.

Reviews.Title: Great camera
Reviews.Author: Dee
Reviews.Content: Had one similar, but broke the door so this I chose to replace it..  This is light weight and small, but don't let the size fool you.  It takes great pictures and is perfect for someone who likes taking pictures but it is not a big hobby.  It's small enough to put in your pocket, so it is always handy for those great shots.  I am not a technical person, but can manage to send photos in emails very easily.  It has an underwater feature with this camera, but have never tried it.  A warning appears about the underwater when you first turn on the camera, but there is a way to shut it off.

Reviews.Title: It is waterproof!
Reviews.Author: cice
Reviews.Content: I purchased this camera for a cruise, which included several days of snorkeling and beach trips.  It was very easy to use, and we had no problem with the waterproof feature. It was definitely waterproof! We snorkeled with it on two different occasions and also took it to the beach another time. By the way, it came in very handy during a rainy day excursion also.  This being said, the picture quality is just so-so.  My son said it best, when he stated that our smart phones produce better quality photos (although our smart phones aren't waterproof!).  The pictures from the Lumix require a fair amount of  photo editing on the computer in order to produce photos with acceptable coloring.  The focus tends not to be as crisp as I had hoped.I give this camera an acceptable 3 stars, because we had no problem what-so-ever with its waterproof capabilities, and were able to have fun taking photographs underwater. Overall, the quality of the photos was below my expectations. That being said, if you are looking to purchase a moderate priced camera to have fun with at the beach, this is a good option.

Reviews.Title: Snorkeling
Reviews.Author: Buyer
Reviews.Content: Bought two of these for my adult children to take on vacation. I also bought myself another brand at the same time. I liked the way you can go from video to still shots simply by pressing a different button. It came with a strap to put around your wrist while underwater to feel more secure but could use something to make it tighter. Takes wonderfull clear images, just be sure to clear the lens of water when going from water to land pics. Worked great in the saltwater and fresh. The reason for only 4 stars is that I can change modes faster and easier with my other brand name camera.

Reviews.Title: Great middle of the road camera!
Reviews.Author: phenley
Reviews.Content: Great underwater camera with lots of nice features for the price! I can't wait to see my son's photos from Bora Bora.

Reviews.Title: Great quality, fast operation
Reviews.Author: Nick Contorno
Reviews.Content: Needed to get a camera for underwater shots on a cruise. After a little looking around and suggestions from friends, we landed on this one. We were not disappointed.The different modes make choosing setting much easier. Underwater shots come out great. Power on is very short and non-flash pictures are very quick. Instructions were great for cleaning and care.

Reviews.Title: I dropped it in the lake
Reviews.Author: Uncle Ed
Reviews.Content: I was duck hunting, like to take pics in the down time, which on certain days can be a lot, and pulled this out on a frigid day and my hands were so cold it slid right out, hit the rail of the boat and plop into the water.  I fished it out, patted it dry for a few seconds, blew on it a few times and began to take pictures.  Since then both of my hunting buddies have bought the same camera.  Cell phones just cannot hold a candle to this units quality and easy of use.

Reviews.Title: Good product just two suggestions.
Reviews.Author: Yiralda Hernandez
Reviews.Content: The camera is great works perfectly, however should sell it to external memory included and have the option to change the language of the camera.

Reviews.Title: panasonic underwater camera
Reviews.Author: grandma
Reviews.Content: I have bought these for all of my grandchildren when they turned 6 yrs old.  It is a sturdy camera and the lens is enclosed.  You do not have to worry about the lens mechanism breaking.  They do not use them underwater but do take them to the beach.

Reviews.Title: Great little camera
Reviews.Author: James J Kanelos
Reviews.Content: This camera takes very nice pictures.Did well in the water and out.Just make sure you soak it after each use in the ocean and you will be very happy!

Reviews.Title: exactly what i expected
Reviews.Author: Zachary Sale
Reviews.Content: i liked how promptly it arrived; it was clear, the camera works great; and the camera has so many more settings that are useful; such as a setting for sunsets/sunrises, starry skies, water setting, and up close setting. all very cool.

Reviews.Title: No issues at all, picture quality is pretty good
Reviews.Author: RC-Everett
Reviews.Content: We took the camera to Florida and a cruise in the Western Caribbean. I used it while snorkeling at a sunken ship off the Grand Cayman island and had no issues. I even had to swap flash cards half way through the excursion and it was fine. I did make sure the seal was clean and dry before closing and locking the cover. The next day the camera again got wet during a down pour in Cozumel and yet again during an air-boat ride in the Everglades. If you follow the instructions and make sure the seal is clean and dry when you close the cover the camera can handle water.

Reviews.Title: Good for the purpose
Reviews.Author: Igor Sorokin
Reviews.Content: I purchased the camera recently specifically for underwater fun and used it on my vacation to Mexico. It worked just fine. I did not expect extra quality shots from its lens. However the fun was there. The camera stayed dry during my 4 snorkeling sessions and took some good pictures above the surface too. Here is the link to some samples:  [...]

Reviews.Title: Usually Canon - Loving Lumix!
Reviews.Author: All-Access Customer "Kristine PhotoGal"
Reviews.Content: I wanted a pocket size camera to carry with me each day -- I had a Canon Powershot previously but the lens cover jammed so I wanted a lens that did not have this same feature - So glad I went with the Lumix -- The size, weight, and results are everything I was hoping for ...

Reviews.Title: Great little camera!
Reviews.Author: Gerard F Doyle
Reviews.Content: Wanted a simple to use but "good" camera for my wife for Christmas. This fit the bill. She loves it!

Reviews.Title: High performance
Reviews.Author: Rodrigo A. Campos Cordero
Reviews.Content: I tested the camera en sunny, warm and wet places. The photos are perfect even in the tropical conditions.Light weight and easy operating system are good for everybody.It have a low price for a big quality product.

Reviews.Title: Not worth the cost...
Reviews.Author: Emmayee
Reviews.Content: Outside pictures without zoom and flash are passable. Inside pictures not great. Underwater pics are blurry. :( Definitely not worth the cost....

Reviews.Title: Great for use IATA Disney
Reviews.Author: MARIAN G
Reviews.Content: Adequate for the price. My daughter wanted a camera she could use in Orlando Florida. She is frequently at the Disney resorts. So far the pictures are clear and sharp

Reviews.Title: Great camera
Reviews.Author: jacqueline st. hilaire
Reviews.Content: Lighweight, easy to use and very nice pics.  Easy to download also.  Very pleased with it so far but looking forward to taking it on a trip soon.

Reviews.Title: Very Good Quality Camera!
Reviews.Author: U. Bell
Reviews.Content: Used underwater, at the beach, while snorkling...etc I only wich there was more zoom; however, the zoom was pretty clear, not too fuzzy like other cameras.

Reviews.Title: Awesome!!!! underwater recording quality
Reviews.Author: Enthu "Kanika"
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera just before our trip to Cancun Mexico couple of weeks back.  I was looking for a waterproof camera that I could use in the pool and beach.  I ended up using this under water on a Sea Treck tour we went in eXcaret park in Cancun.  The quality of the video underwater was awesome.  Just the underwater recordings on this one trip I feel paid off the price of the camera ($112) I feel.  I am not sure if I can upload a snippet of the underwater recording here, but will try to google and if I find a way to do it, I will.  The regular picture quality too is awesome.  There were a few pictures that were pixilated, but I remember playing around with different modes, and seems like in one of the modes, the picture quality came bad.  But overall, I am very please with this camera.

Reviews.Title: Great pictures inor out of water.
Reviews.Author: Sebastian Stallone
Reviews.Content: Good all around camera, for its price range, only flaw is it did not charge with usb cable, have to use battery adapter plug.

Reviews.Title: One step up from my last one
Reviews.Author: Helen
Reviews.Content: This camera is one step up from my last Panasonic. A few added features that will make it great for bike and hiking trips.

Reviews.Title: The best little camera!
Reviews.Author: Esther Lietsch "Esther's Treasures"
Reviews.Content: This was a present for my husband, he had a Lumix before it last years and finally the battery die he was thinking in getting a new battery that is how much in love he was with his camera, it took beautiful pictures and he took it to every party we had, now he got this one, same brand but updated,  and he is delighted with his new toy, has a lot of new functions, is light, and take beautiful picture! This is a great camera, you can take it any where just put it in your pocket and go!  Not complicated, easy to use , and is water resistant, which means that if for any reason get wet  won't stop functioning , just dried it and keep on going!  Believe me you won't go wrong with this one.

Reviews.Title: Great camera
Reviews.Author: Rita Forest
Reviews.Content: Bought as a gift for my grandson so it hasn't been put to hard use yet in the water or on a grip

Reviews.Title: Awesome underwater video
Reviews.Author: B. Wolfe
Reviews.Content: Bought this for my husband for Christmas for a snorkeling trip in the Philippines.  Unbeknownst to me, he had purchased a different brand for himself!  We took both cameras with us on the trip to a fabulous snorkeling site, and the underwater color videos taken with the Lumix were better color and quality than the other brand.  Great point and shoot as well.

Reviews.Title: Pictures were not as clear as hoped
Reviews.Author: tito cueva
Reviews.Content: Underwater pictures were not as clear as my sons cheaper underwater camera.  Was a bit disappointed.  I ended up giving it to my 11 yr old daughter to snap pics on vacation.

Reviews.Title: Great underwater camera, took some excellent photos in average light
Reviews.Author: reviewer999999
Reviews.Content: The camera is great for closeup (less than 12 feet) photography, stick to 0-4 feet underwater unless incredibly clear.But don't use for landscapes or distance photos, just not the camera for that.  At the price point - this is a great choice for underwater holiday photos.

Reviews.Title: awesome camera!
Reviews.Author: Emain
Reviews.Content: this camera is awesome! if you take care of it the way it shows in the instructions this camera can do and go anywhere. multiple trips to the beach and in the ocean ( we try and keep it out of the sand, but the times it did hit sand nothing was compromised!) just have to make sure that nothing gets in or on the seems of the battery door!would buy again - Pictures are great. underwater pics depend on how clear the water is

Reviews.Title: Good camera
Reviews.Author: David L. Neer
Reviews.Content: Easy to operate and takes great snapshots and short videos.  Menu is easy to understand.  Have not yet used underwater.

Reviews.Title: Good Camera
Reviews.Author: Waldo "Waldo"
Reviews.Content: I am happy with this camera.  Used it for a snorkeling trip and it worked great for that and the rest of the vacation photos.

Reviews.Title: Lumix
Reviews.Author: Mike
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera to take on a trip to the Caribbean. I had priced underwater cases for other camera and decided to give this Lumix a shot, even with some of the mixed reviews. This camera works just fine. Took it snorkeling and was able to operate the camera underwater, took both pictures and video. The photos are not as good as some cameras, but overall I was very pleased with this camera, especially considering the price point. I had bought it with the theory of if it broke I would not be out a lot of money. Was pleasantly surprised with this camera.

Reviews.Title: This camera is fantastic!
Reviews.Author: L. Main
Reviews.Content: This camera is fantastic!  I bought for my MIL, and now I wish I could trade my waterproof camera for hers.  The quick response really makes a huge difference when taking pictures of moving objects (like my 3 yr old ALWAYS is), and it does great out of water which is where my Olymus TG-320 falls short.I would highly recommend this camera.

Reviews.Title: Mediocre camera
Reviews.Author: Jesuaph Nario
Reviews.Content: The two reasons I am giving this camera three stars is:One, the pictures do not come out as sharp.two,  In the fast moving mode it does not do what it promisses

Reviews.Title: GREAT PRODUCT!
Reviews.Author: Jason
Reviews.Content: Great product, I am very happy with my purchase.  The quality and price was great!  I would definitely recommend this to friends!

Reviews.Title: great camera
Reviews.Author: E Moreth
Reviews.Content: Takes great pictures and the underwater function works perfectly. Videos are very good also. Easy to learn and my daughter loves the color.

Reviews.Title: Great camera
Reviews.Author: Kay "Catherine Grenfell"
Reviews.Content: Bought this for a 10-year-old who loved it.  He had one just like it but managed to lose it last September.  This one will be a Christmas gift.  Which it came with a clip to fasten the strap to a pocket.

Reviews.Title: happy
Reviews.Author: maria paz
Reviews.Content: very pleased. the camera is very light. great quality in the pictures. basic functins, but just what i wanted. pleased

Reviews.Title: Perfect size, excellent quality
Reviews.Author: Erik Novoa
Reviews.Content: This is one of the best all purpose cameras on the market. It's perfect for keeping in your back pocket at a party or taking a panoramic picture on a hike. My pro camera is a tank but I hardly have it with me because of Hoeger weight. This is the camera that is with me all the time, which means it gets the shot.

Reviews.Title: Great choice
Reviews.Author: Pen Name
Reviews.Content: This camera exceeded my expectations- excellent quality during the day. Night shots not as good. Would buy this camera again!!

Reviews.Title: Meets and exceeds expectations
Reviews.Author: Gr8Mom
Reviews.Content: This is definitely one tough little camera. It was so great to get to video my son swimming under water for the first time. It's been through a water park, pool, beach, kayaking. Great camera for people tough on their stuff.

Reviews.Title: Great little camera
Reviews.Author: castalure
Reviews.Content: This little camera is terrific.  I use it when fishing, attached to my hat, mostly for videos.  The wide angle lets me get everything I need, without worrying if I'm looking exactly in the right direction, and it's waterproof, so I don't have to worry about using it in the rain.  It's also simple to use, so my not tech savvy wife can take good pictures with it too.  It's actually supposed to be her camera.

Reviews.Title: Great underwater camera
Reviews.Author: JTB71
Reviews.Content: I used this camera in the pool and took great movies and pictures. I also now use it in the rain instead of taking my larger camera. It is also small enough to fit in my pocket.

Reviews.Title: WOW!!!
Reviews.Author: Jake
Reviews.Content: I have never owned a camera I loved this much. I raft, bike, hike, & adventure, and this camera holds it's own. I researched for a better camera after my wife's 5th took a dump. I got her the orange one and then couldn't wait to get my black one. I have put this thing through all heck: spelunking the Ape Caves at Mt. St. Helens - and we found almost 200 Km of seemingly less explored tunnel; I had knee pads on & a helmet. I've also taken this camera in the Pacific Ocean countless times, Mt. Hood National Forest, rafting through class 3 & lower rapids (it could handle more), Yosemite valley; these cameras are our travel partners. I can't find words to express how proud of myself for getting these cameras - and how proud my wife is as well :0).

Reviews.Title: Good petite waterproof camera
Reviews.Author: Lindsey
Reviews.Content: We purchased this camera for our honeymoon. We have yet to use it in the ocean, but I tested it out in the pool and it worked well. I love how small and light this camera is. I always lug my heavy Nikon SLR around when on vacation. It is nice to have a second, smaller, back-up camera that will fit in my pocket and is waterproof. This is my 2nd Panasonic Lumix purchase and I continue to be impressed by their products.

Reviews.Title: Compact, tough, and takes great pictures
Reviews.Author: Harry Heflin
Reviews.Content: I purchased this camera to take on a 23 day private Grand Canyon rafting trip. I wanted something that would shrug off the dust, sand, and serious water splashes since on my previous trips compact regular point and shoot cameras have died partway through the trip -- even though I was being very careful to keep them clean and dry. It's just a tough environment on the river. Sadly it cannot use AAA batts which are easy to recharge, but I bought a couple of extra lithium batts and was able to keep them charged using a solar charger. Off the river, since there is no lens extension to the front, the camera is slender and tends to fit well in the pocket. It fits in the 'watch' pocket on my jeans and I take it pretty much everwhere, not worrying about the environment. The kids love using it underwater, too!

Reviews.Title: good quality!!
Reviews.Author: Lindamarce "lindamarce"
Reviews.Content: It has an acceptable quality but it's not accord to the offered. It functions ok in all places but it could be better with 16.1Mp!!!

Reviews.Title: Awesome underwater camera
Reviews.Author: Roe
Reviews.Content: I JUST LOVE this camera. took awesome photos on my vacation. Fun and easy to use and it takes great photos in and out of the water.

Reviews.Title: Fine, but a little heavier than expected
Reviews.Author: Kevin McCloskey
Reviews.Content: Dropped my old similar Panasonic DMC FP2 about 3 feet on to the sidewalk and it broke. No apparent damage, but it just stopped working. Actually, that was my second Panasonic that met that fate. I am clumsy, I guess. So I paid a bit more for the anti-shock feature on this one. I am not going to test it. But it promises it survived a 5 foot drop onto 1 inch plywood. So I still need to be careful on sidewalk. I am not likely to try the waterproof feature either. Size,same as prior camera, so old case and even cord to computer can be reused. Alas, battery is a different size.My first impression: this is heavier because of the "armor", same fine photo quality. Battery life is good.

Reviews.Title: Great camera for the price
Reviews.Author: J. Keillor
Reviews.Content: This camera is awesome. It's compact so its easy to carry around but it also takes great pictures and I love the color we chose, teal.

Reviews.Title: Inexpensive water proof camera
Reviews.Author: c. lam
Reviews.Content: Wish I bought it earlier.  Nice pictures, works in water, no leaks.  Small enough to be very convenient.  At this price, it's not fair to complain.

Reviews.Title: Perfect Camera for the money.
Reviews.Author: Vicente T. Rodriguez
Reviews.Content: Love this camera for the money,you get a very good compact lens,great underwater and normal pictures,plus all the other features like wide angle,16 MP,OIS,AI. I would buy it again .

Reviews.Title: DIgital Camera
Reviews.Author: Amazonian
Reviews.Content: Easy to use with no complications.  I haven't tried dropping the camera, nor have I attempted to submersed it.  It appears durable and more importantly it takes good pictures.

Reviews.Title: Too Late to Return
Reviews.Author: Lost In Louisiana
Reviews.Content: I just recently had the opportunity to use this camera. I tried it out in the swimming pool and all seemed well. I took it snorkeling in the Caribbean and it took about 25 pictures then the camera froze. Now it turns on to a solid white screen and has zero functionality.I certainly didn't snorkel to 20ft! I was at the surface. Obviously it was closed properly or I wouldn't have been able to take the photos that I did. It malfunctioned after having been used and not re-opened during the same photo session. The few pictures it took were great, if that matters. I would rate it higher had I been able to get a replacement. That was some expensive photos!

Reviews.Title: Didn't last long...
Reviews.Author: Marly
Reviews.Content: Love Panasonic lumix cameras so my husband got me a rugged underwater one for Christmas.  Great pics and videos...but it only lasted for two trips.  I took great pains and followed the instructions for rinsing and being careful after using in water but now I have a permanent " reinsert sd card" on the screen.....it will cost me more to have it repaired than to try another type.  Looked online and this camera seems to have a problem with this....so disappointed but will try another brand

Reviews.Title: Caribbean camera
Reviews.Author: walls5145
Reviews.Content: Bought this camera to use snorkeling and tubing in the Caribbean. Had it in the water for hours doing both and it worked perfectly.Be sure to read the instructions well and make sure no dirt or other items get in the seal on the battery and sd card door. I also bought a flotation wrist strap so that when I couldn't be holding the camera I didn't have to worry about dropping it and sinking to the bottom.If it did come off your wrist it would be floating on top of the water.

Reviews.Title: Terrible "waterproof" camera
Reviews.Author: MM
Reviews.Content: This is the worst camera we have owned. The second time we used it the seal broke and water leaked in. Panasonic is no help. Don't waste your money. We have owned the olympus waterproof and it was great I regret not spending the money to replace that one with another olympus. Will never buy a panasonic camera again.

Reviews.Title: Not waterproof
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: My family took this camera on our recent trip to the Florida and Bahamas. While in Florida we were very pleased with the picture quality and the ease of use...point and shoot. We couldn't wait to use it when we went snorkeling. That's where it all went down hill. The first time in the water it failed miserably. itr shut off and never came back on. Not only did we lose all of the pictures from out snorkeling trip but everything that was on the memory card before that. Not worth the money if your looking for a waterproof camera don't bother.

Reviews.Title: Definitely not a waterproof camera!
Reviews.Author: amazononly
Reviews.Content: I followed all instructions on using the product underwater. On the first day of my vacation I took the camera into a 5 foot pool. After taking a few pictures, I sent it out to dry. The next day I opened the camera and found water inside the battery compartment,  then my camera wouldn't turn on properly and my sd card had a read error on another camera. This camera cannot be called waterproof if it is that sensative to being inside water for 10 minutes. I should've shelled out a little more money and bought an actual waterproof camera.

Reviews.Title: Not worth the money
Reviews.Author: Janet Elkins
Reviews.Content: The very first time I took it in water it got water in it and it was not worth the money I spent on it.

Reviews.Title: Excellent Camera for backpacking
Reviews.Author: David Haggist
Reviews.Content: After a recent thru hike in Vermont where it rain constantly and I found myself having to return my camera to a dry sack, its going to be nice to be able to keep my camera close at hand despite the weather.  The camera is easy to operate and the picture quality is very good.

Reviews.Title: Works as Kalashnikov
Reviews.Author: George
Reviews.Content: Works as Kalashnikov . Good camera for work at sites. Quality of pictures not so brilliant, but for work ok.

Reviews.Title: Like!!
Reviews.Author: D Lindsay
Reviews.Content: The only thing I don't like about this camera is it hesitates to take an underwater picture. You push the button and there is a hesitation before it actually takes the picture.  Other than that, works great!

Reviews.Title: horrible product
Reviews.Author: Yoko St Peter
Reviews.Content: I ordered this camera for my Hawaii trip with expedited shipping.  It supposed to be waterproof up to 24 fts, but as soon as we took it to beach and started to take pictures, lenses and flash filled up with water, LCD screen wasn't even displaying anything, it was horrible.  It definitely ruined my vacation pictures.  I do not recommend this product.

Reviews.Title: Worked well no leaks
Reviews.Author: Dylane
Reviews.Content: The Ocean pics look a little cloudy but then again it was the ocean.  We didn't have any issues we water leakage.  We followed the directions to soak in freshwater after each  ocean use.  The lens fogged once but after airing it out for an hour or so it was back to clear.

Reviews.Title: Wish It Had A Viewfinder
Reviews.Author: Frederick L. Ashworth
Reviews.Content: This is a great little camera.  i would give it 5 stars in a second, but still wish it had a viewfinder.  In the broad sunlight it, as with all the point and shoot digitals, the screen is virtually impossible to see.  Somebody should come up with some sort of cover for the screen that would filter out the bright light.  Now that would be worth having.  I especially like the panorama feature in this camera.  I'm no longer afraid to take a camera out in the kayak.

Reviews.Title: Great camera!
Reviews.Author: Kathie Spanos
Reviews.Content: We bought this camera to use on beach vacations and it was perfect. We took it in the pool, and to the beach and used it for scenic shots. It took great pictures, the colors looked accurate and it was easy to use. We didn't have any issues with the lens fogging up or sand or water getting inside the camera. When we got home we watched the images on the TV and they looked very crisp. The camera is very small and lightweight and had good battery life.

Reviews.Title: Panasonic NOT worth the TROUBLE!
Reviews.Author: suzannell
Reviews.Content: I ordered a camera from them and it quickly had a system error and would not function. They sent a refurbished one, same error, and a another refurb, same error. Basically just sent junk refurbished items until it was out of warranty. Happened again when it was out of warranty by a couple of weeks and then said too bad despite the fact we'd only had the replacement for about two months. Horrible product, even worse customer service!

Reviews.Title: Leaked second time!
Reviews.Author: Frank Albanese
Reviews.Content: I got this for our trip to Bermuda. It worked great at a water park where it got splashed. Unfortunately in Bermuda where it got submerged in 4 feet of water it leaked and stopped working. So if you looking for a $150 single use camera then this is the one.The few pictures its took were ok but nothing to write home about. You get what you pay for.

Reviews.Title: Takes nice pictures
Reviews.Author: David F. Tapia
Reviews.Content: Works well underwater, It froze on me a couple times and i had to open up the battery cover to pull the batter to get it to work again. Very frustrating when you're in the water,,,,, Other than that. the pictures are nice underwater and on land.

Reviews.Title: 0 STARS!!
Reviews.Author: LG
Reviews.Content: I normally never write product ratings but I felt compelled to write this one to warn future buyers of this camera.I was looking for a compact camera that could take some of the pictures where my iphone 5 falls short: night pictures with flash.Since I was already in the market for a compact camera I thought I may as well go for one I can take with me anywhere: the beach, pool, snowboarding, etc without having to worry about water damage.I went for this camera because normally Panasonic cameras take very good pictures since they use Leica lenses which I consider some of the best lens manufactures out there. Since this one had a Leica lens I imagined picture quality would be good, but I was completely wrong.Pictures without flash were dull and pictures with flash were ultra bright and some of them came out blurry even though they were still pictures. In addition, the water damage warning continuously pops up (ALL the time!) even though the battery cap is securely closed and locked. Finally, the monitor is super grainy and VERY slow to respond, so when you move the camera from one side to another you get a blurry and choppy image until you stop moving the camera. Totally useless in my opinion...I hope Panasonic made a better job with the TS5. I would expect that to be the case since it costs nearly twice as much as this one.0 stars for this camera if this option was possible...

Reviews.Title: Read the isntructions!
Reviews.Author: A. Customer
Reviews.Content: The camera started out with great pictures - or at least as great as the photographer.  Then we took a spill in the kayak and it go submerged.  Now, really, the lens was not wiped after that so I cannot blame the fact that there are water spots on the pictures on the camera!  The camera is very easy to handle and during that dip the memory card was not at all affected.  This is so much like my easy Kodak - just wish I would have thought to wipe the lense after the dip!  The only reason I didn't give it a 5 is because the buttons are so close together and the waters we were on were not the least bit calm so you couldn't really look at where you were putting your finger and it was easy to inadvertently hit the video or the off button instead of the picture taking button.  Love the color of this camera too!

Reviews.Title: Great little camera
Reviews.Author: Leon Photo
Reviews.Content: Great litle camera..  Like the Panorama feature plus can drop it in a pocketand though I will not take it swimming.. It issomewhat waterproof

Reviews.Title: I'm not desappointed
Reviews.Author: Mariane Coutinho
Reviews.Content: Is a good camera, since you take a good care of. Good pictures, specially I the pool, at the ocean is a little bit blurry.

Reviews.Title: Least favorite small camera
Reviews.Author: Happy Guy
Reviews.Content: We haven't even tried it underwater, but that's the only place we'll be using it in the future.  The pictures didn't meet our (admittedly high) standards.  Any Canon or Sony point and shoot will kick out far superior photos.

Reviews.Title: Just started using
Reviews.Author: M. Resende
Reviews.Content: I had a TS20 that lasted no more than one year. Decided to buy the new model. It's a cheap underwater camera that fit its purpose.

Reviews.Title: A little underwhelmed
Reviews.Author: Neil Pinnick
Reviews.Content: Not quite what I expected.  The controls are not as good as some other models.  Wish I could return it.

Reviews.Title: Poor Picture Quality
Reviews.Author: Swan
Reviews.Content: I know it's not suppose to be great, but the pics it took on a trip to Colombia were of pretty poor quality.  My cell phone or 4 year old Canon point and shoot killed this thing.  The picture modes were easy to switch in and out of and the camera worked well under water, but all-in-all I wouldn't purchase again.

Reviews.Title: Its not HD but it works very well
Reviews.Author: Laura
Reviews.Content: The camera is not profesional and i never expected HD pictures, but its underwater function does work correctly. When i opened it i first tasted the camera without the battery or memory to see if water came through and it didnt; i tried it with the battery and memory later on a crystal water cup so i could see myself on the other side and the video seemed to be alright. I love the color of the camera, i'm in love with it and i cant wait to try it at the beach or pool �.

Reviews.Title: Surprisingly Tough
Reviews.Author: Andrew
Reviews.Content: I first became aware of this camera in my job as a cell tower climber. We normally use a camera to document our work, but the normal camera we use had been forgotten. A coworker happened to have one of these with him and, volunteered it instead. I immediately managed to drop it 260 feet onto a steel Verizon cabinet, where it bounced off into the gravel. It was, of course, broken, but just barely. The screen still worked, the lens and ccd still worked, and the only apparent problem was with saving to the memory card. I now have my own, and have taken it climbing, canyoneering, climbing, swimming, flying, etc. and haven't managed to destroy it yet. Recommended.

Reviews.Title: Love it!
Reviews.Author: J.Lee
Reviews.Content: Great replacement to a previous version of the Lumix that I had. Although I have not dropped this one in the water yet, I expect this one to be just as waterproof and life proof as the previous one!

Reviews.Title: Good little camera
Reviews.Author: Chris
Reviews.Content: This camera is a decent low end camera.  It takes good pictures but the zoom is not the greatest.  The panoramic function is pretty good and the water proof capability is good.  Underwater pictures will take some practice to get good shots, but I think it is possible

Reviews.Title: This is my second one!
Reviews.Author: poppanam
Reviews.Content: I had the previous model and the only issue I had with that one was that it wouldn't return on command. The old one's at the bottom of a river so I had to get this one. It works perfectly!

Reviews.Title: Very good
Reviews.Author: C. Lan
Reviews.Content: the package was well received and the quality is very good, and I was right on time for vacation, satisfaction.

Reviews.Title: Just keeps rocking.
Reviews.Author: GP The Engineer
Reviews.Content: Bought as a gift for a friend who loves the outdoors. He's had it for a few months now and used it far more than even i expected.Pros:- The rugged exterior isn't just for show. Really is holding up well.- Simple point and shoot. Doesn't take 5 min to decide what settings to use in order to get some good shots.- Compact size. Especially when we're talking packing this with the rest of your gear...last thing you want is to have to carry a second bag for just your camera.Cons:- Photo quality. Maybe it's operator error, but overly bright shots seem to be quite normal.Summary:- I hope they keep developing and launching rugged products going forward. For the money, this was a great buy!

Reviews.Title: LOVE IT!!
Reviews.Author: Alicia
Reviews.Content: This camera is AMAZING!!  HIGHLY RECOMMEND to anyone looking for a durable camera with underwater capabilities!Pros:- The auto focus is great both in camera mode and video mode.- When zooming in on an object, the camera can blur out the background so that the primary focus of the picture is the object being zoomed in on- The creative controls allow pictures to be taken in a way that can normally only be done via a photo shop kind of program. (i.e. if taking a picture of a flower, there is a creative control that allows you to focus in on a specific color in the picture, such as the base color of the flower, while making the rest of the picture dull or black and white).- Underwater capabilities are great, pictures taken under water are of great quality- Burst mode enables action shots without missing a beat- An abundance of different "modes" allows you to take a great quality picture no matter what atmosphere you are in.Cons:- Cannot use the flash with burst mode making it hard to capture "action shots" if the lighting is not the greatest (i.e. taking pictures of your child riding a carnival ride)- Camera is not the easiest to use in terms of all of the different features, must learn all of the features in order to really capitilize on the camera functionality and quality.- I have found that in different scenes, I need to physically change the camera mode to the scene type because the "auto" option does not always accurately detect the "scene" (i.e. a picture taken at night will turn out alot better when the camera is in one of the "night scenes" as opposed to leaving the camera in "auto mode" and allowing it to self adjust)

Reviews.Title: Underwater: Yay!
Reviews.Author: L. Dooley "Linda"
Reviews.Content: came home from a beach trip where a friend had an underwater camera and immediately got this one: it's also great for bad weather or kayaking

Reviews.Title: no much tough
Reviews.Author: jhon cadena
Reviews.Content: i think than this is more tough, i preffer my olympus 14mpx, is better than this, more cuality in photo and equipment

Reviews.Title: Lighweight, compact camera great for quick pictures and the quality was good for a point and shoot camera.
Reviews.Author: Nicholas J.  Watsik
Reviews.Content: So far so good.  I bought this camera for my son to take on his Boy Scout backpack trip to the John Muir Trail in California. It has only been used once so far but it took great pictures.  I can not vouch for the waterproof capabilities yet because it was not used near the water.

Reviews.Title: Great point and shoot waterproof camera!
Reviews.Author: Margaret E Smith
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera since my husband and I travel a lot.  So far I have used it in the pool, at a water park, and during a power snorkel excursion during our cruise.  It has an underwater setting that I used while snorkeling.  I read in reviews that people's pictures underwater were dark, so I turned on the flash and it took great underwater pictures.  I also used it as our primary camera for our vacation, and I thought it took great point and shoot pictures and the battery lasted a long time.  I made sure I followed all of the cleaning procedures after we got back from the beach and had no problems. I would highly recommend this camera!

Reviews.Title: ok for the price
Reviews.Author: el
Reviews.Content: the underwater pics came out good, a little gray-is maybe. i took other regular pictures at the beach and i didn't like the quality, in fact my iphone takes better pics than that.

Reviews.Title: Not very good at low light
Reviews.Author: Fevazro
Reviews.Content: not very good quality pictures for the price. Is almost unusable in low light. Not happy with the video quality.

Reviews.Title: Durable and Waterproof, But Photo Quality is Poor
Reviews.Author: John
Reviews.Content: We've been using this camera every few days for almost three months now.  Probably taken 1,000+ pictures.We have a Panasonic Lumix DMC‑ZS19 and love it.  So when this camera was on sale we decided to purchase it for two reasons.i) waterproof - we are at the beach a lotii) tough - have two small kids who like to pretend to use the camera.Pros-The camera is compact and tough.  We've had several small drops with it without any problems.-It is waterproof, and it is nice to take it into the water. Just be sure to buy a Float in case you get hit by a big wave and drop it!Cons-the camera shows damage quickly.  We've dropped all our cameras many times and this one scratches very easily (disappointing considering it is "tough" camera.-the picture quality is quite poor.  Our ZS19 camera is only 14MP and its pictures are way higher quality.  Even our old Sony T100 camera takes more vibrant photos (It's only 8MP).  This TS25 camera seems to struggle with the whiteness/brightness in pictures (parts of picture seem too bright) and when you scale 1:1 details (like leaves on trees) are blotchy (poor sharpness).  This doesn't happen on the ZS19 camera we have or our old Sony T100.  I even went so far as to contact Panasonic customer support and sent identical shot comparative pictures of this vs the ZS19 & T100.  After many emails/tests they said to send it back for repair.  Instead I got a replacement through Amazon and compared the two TS25 cameras and pictures from both cameras were the same!  Glad I didn't pay to return it to Panasonic.We are going to keep the camera.  It serves its purpose of being compact, durable and water poof.  If we want nice quality pictures though, we definitely do not use this camera.

Reviews.Title: BEST CAMERA I'VE EVER HAD!!!
Reviews.Author: Gloria
Reviews.Content: This camera is amazing!!! It takes clear photos & video and has very good zoom and macro for what it is. The best part, in my opinion, is its ability to go underwater, and it takes amazing pics under there, too! It's tough and freezeproof, so it's perfect for snowmobiling and four-wheeling, has many useful settings, and helpful enhancements & effects. It also fits very well in my pocket :)All in all, it's a great camera for the low price, I'd definitely recommend it.

Reviews.Title: Lousy underwater pics!! Gave it the lowest rating  I could.
Reviews.Author: Donald Hunter
Reviews.Content: Bought the Panasonic Lumix TS25 since the Amazon reviews were very high. Have had a regular Lumix for years, so I thought their underwater would be fine.  I was SO WRONG. All my underwater shots have poor sharpness and too much blue, no matter what setting I use: Autofocus, Sports, Underwater, Advanced Underwater -- they all gave me the same lousy pictures. I am so disappointed, since I am now in Roatan, Honduras with an underwater camera that takes lousy underwater pics. It's almost like the settings don't work, since all the pics are poor. Even the regular outdoors in good sunlight are not sharp.  I'm hoping Amazon will do something to help me recover from this, even though I've used the camera. I'm going for an Olympus with the next one. My daughter has one and it has taken GREAT pics here in Roatan.

Reviews.Title: It is supposed to be a great camera
Reviews.Author: Norka M. Diaz
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera in January, the first time I used it works perfect.  On April 19 I was going to used for second time and the battery was dead, I charged again and only let me take some pictures.  I charged again por more than 12 hours and the same, only let me take some pictures and the battery when off.  Very disappoint for the price.

Reviews.Title: OLD CARACTERISTICS
Reviews.Author: MIGUEL PLAZA
Reviews.Content: this is a camera with a bad ressolution, its screen show a poor image on the other hand it looks very nice and resistent, you can sink it in the wáter, but it doesnt have good functios

Reviews.Title: Wonderful
Reviews.Author: T
Reviews.Content: Used this for the first time this weekend. Still pictures are great. Underwater pics.....1) if there is not enough light the pictures are kinda dark. 2) if there is plenty of light the pictures are wonderful. 3) Video is wonderful underwater also. 4)easy to operate for pictures and video. The underwater message is annoying but can be shut off.

Reviews.Title: So far nice camera
Reviews.Author: CFoxtrot
Reviews.Content: I did not rate this a 5 star because I have not had it in the water yet. Camera takes good all around images,capable of satisfactory low light(with flash) photos with low noise, far better than the Pentax I purchased first and returned.Controls are easy to use, however the buttons are a bit hard to read.Dedicated movie button comes in handy when going from taking photosto recording movies.

Reviews.Title: Felt like a toy returning.
Reviews.Author: Asylums Dawn
Reviews.Content: I may be spoiled because the previous waterproof camera I had was slim and had a touch screen. When I started using this one it is bulky & feels like a cheap toy camera. THe buttons are too stiff & the picture quality was horrid for being 16mp. I took a couple of pictures & went right back to using my cellphone with a cracked screen.

Reviews.Title: Panasonic Lumix DMC-TS25 16.1 MP Tough Digital Camera with 8x Intelligent Zoom (Blue) (Electronics)
Reviews.Author: Shorian "gadget guru"
Reviews.Content: I likely won't be taking any underwater shots with this camera but it is nice to know I can. I like that the camera can take some abuse without damage. I have taken some stills in very low light conditions, and the results were better than I expected. I like being able to switch to video with one button. That is a great feature. I haven't tried the panoramic view and time lapse photography yet, but I intend to as soon as my SD card arrives.I have just a couple of cons: The buttons are tiny and a little difficult for me to use. I would like to see a larger on/off button. I have an older model Panasonic DMC-FP1 and to turn it on all I have to do is slide down the lens cover. I understand that this feature would be hard to implement on a waterproof camera.Also, my first few pictures showed my finger covering part of the lens. I find holding the camera so as not to get my finger in the picture, somewhat awkward.Overall, I am satisfied with the camera.

Reviews.Title: great little point and shoot
Reviews.Author: Kyla
Reviews.Content: I purchased this camera because i wanted a walk around point and shoot that i could keep with me at all times and I wanted something I could use for underwater images. I normally shoot with my canon 7d but try to leave that as my pro camera, and my t3i when I want something more than a point and shoot but I love having this thing when I am out with friends. I am going to Mexico in March and will see how it does under water at that point. I'm pretty happy with this camera at this point. It has been sharp, so simple to use, and it is slim enough that I can carry it with me every where I go. I don't have to worry about my nieces and nephews snagging it to snap some shots because it is durable. I have a canon g9 as well and love this one 100 times more than that point and shoot. Anyway, if you are looking for something simple, easy to use, but with different features you can play with, I'd definitely suggest this one. We'll see how it does under water!

Reviews.Title: good
Reviews.Author: diego andres ramirez
Reviews.Content: I arrived at lowest I weather conditions recom endaria all my family and friends just as I think of ordering another camera

Reviews.Title: Good value
Reviews.Author: Michael D Meints "Mike"
Reviews.Content: Would be best if it had a floating hand strap.  Still a great value for the money.  Would recommend for use.  We use it on our PWC and do not fear it getting wet.  Also have used it for outdoor sports in the rain.

Reviews.Title: lightweight and good pictures
Reviews.Author: Vestal Mike
Reviews.Content: This camera seems very durable and takes good pictures.  I haven't tried it underwater as of yet, but it has done well banging around in my pocket while hiking.  My only complaint with the camera is more my fault: given the small size it is very easy to have one's fingers partially cover the lens, resulting in pictures of fingers rather than the target.

Reviews.Title: Awesome!
Reviews.Author: C. Gottstine
Reviews.Content: Hard to believe this is waterproof - very good quality camera with many features.  Can't wait to take it to the South Pacific and give it a try!

Reviews.Title: Great pictures
Reviews.Author: Momshan
Reviews.Content: I really liked this camera.  The shutter speed was a little slow, but it really took great pictures.  Mine ended up on the bottom of the ocean floor while we were sailing, so I never developed any prints to see that quality.

Reviews.Title: It does not look so good as I expected...
Reviews.Author: Mila S.
Reviews.Content: It does not look as I thought, cannot use yet because I do not have a charger for battaries... I cannot recommend it

Reviews.Title: Good Item
Reviews.Author: Sandra Morales
Reviews.Content: It is a very good item, but I don't know it is useful to use in water enviroments and if there is warranty if there will be failures by waterproof.

720p Motion JPEG Video, Sonic Speed Auto Focus, Creative Panorama Shot, 12 Effective Creative Control
ProductInfo.Name: Panasonic Lumix DMC-TS25 16.1 MP Tough Digital Camera with 8x Intelligent Zoom (Red)
